channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Synology Router Manager (SRM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Synology Router Manager (SRM)

item.title: CVE-2020-27653|2024-08-04T16:18:45.406Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Algorithm downgrade vulnerability in QuickConnect in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.4-8081 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers and obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2020-27649|2024-08-04T16:18:45.541Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Improper certificate validation vulnerability in OpenVPN client in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.4-8081 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers and obtain sensitive information via a crafted certificate.

item.title: CVE-2020-27657|2024-08-04T16:18:45.483Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information vulnerability in DDNS in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.4-8081 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to eavesdrop authentication information of DNSExit via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2020-27655|2024-08-04T16:18:45.529Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.4-8081 allows remote attackers to access restricted resources via inbound QuickConnect traffic.

item.title: CVE-2020-27654|2024-08-04T16:18:45.541Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in lbd in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.4-8081 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via port (1) 7786/tcp or (2) 7787/tcp.

item.title: CVE-2020-27651|2024-08-04T16:18:45.523Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.4-8081 does not set the Secure flag for the session cookie in an HTTPS session, which makes it easier for remote attackers to capture this cookie by intercepting its transmission within an HTTP session.

item.title: CVE-2020-27658|2024-08-04T16:18:45.562Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.4-8081 does not include the HTTPOnly flag in a Set-Cookie header for the session cookie, which makes it easier for remote attackers to obtain potentially sensitive information via script access to this cookie.

item.title: CVE-2024-39347|2024-07-02T16:39:01.301Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in firewall functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to access highly sensitive intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39347|2024-06-28T06:30:10.727Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in firewall functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to access highly sensitive intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39348|2024-06-28T06:30:57.973Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Download of code without integrity check vulnerability in AirPrint functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39348|2024-06-28T13:39:34.938Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Download of code without integrity check vulnerability in AirPrint functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39347|2024-08-02T04:26:14.241Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in firewall functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to access highly sensitive intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39348|2024-08-02T04:26:14.241Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Download of code without integrity check vulnerability in AirPrint functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.
